Text: RE Request for Assistance Cc Mr Kirst is fine Please ask him to speak with Kevin Kuehler Director of EC of HPL at or if he isnt available Gene Peabody Project Manager at I would think he should start either this pm or tomorrow Gerald we do not have a PSA with SB Engineers we either need to prepare one or utilize Mr Kirst for this short term need based on the rate below and an invoice at the end of the assignment Please coordinate with Kevin Thanks Nick Original Message From Reddish JR ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESReddishCJEREChjreddishsbinfraEcom E NRONcom Sent Wednesday May PM To Cocavessis Nick Subject FW Request for Assistance Lets try this again JR Original Message From Reddish JR Sent Wednesday May PM To Cc Kirst Eddie Flesch Fred Subject Request for Assistance Nick SB Infrastructure is happy to submit Mr Eddie Kirst PE to assist ENRON with the loop effort He is a seasoned civil engineer with over years of paving and underground utility experience in the Houston metropolitan area He is no stranger to Texas City and loop He grew up three blocks off and th Ave in Texas City Eddie is available tomorrow afternoon or at your convince Our understanding is the effort will last approximately a week to days Eddies all in rate is hour plus expenses Should you accept the above offer please forward address and phone contact information to assist Eddie in locating your project manager Sincerely Harold J Reddish PE JR Vice President of Operations
